00012 #ifndef GEN_IF_H_
00013 #define GEN_IF_H_
00014 
00015 /* * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * *
00016  * Generic interface for event generators. Takes a generator base instance,  *
00017  * interface engine instance and interface output instance as constructor    *
00018  * arguments.                                                                *
00019  *                                                                           *
00020  * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * */
00021 
00022 #include <Camgen/if_base.h>
00023 #include <Camgen/if_engine.h>
00024 #include <Camgen/if_output.h>
00025 
00026 namespace Camorra
00027 {
00028     template<class model_t>class generator_interface: public interface_base<model_t>
00029     {
00030         typedef interface_base<model_t> base_type;
00031 
00032         public:
00033 
00034             /* Type definitions: */
00035 
00036             typedef typename base_type::generator_type generator_type;
00037             typedef typename base_type::momentum_type momentum_type;
00038             typedef typename base_type::value_type value_type;
00039             typedef typename base_type::size_type size_type;
00040 
00041             /* Public constructors/destructors: */
00042             /*----------------------------------*/
00043 
00045 
00046             generator_interface(generator_type* gen_,interface_output<model_t>* output_,interface_engine<model_t>* engine_=NULL):base_type(gen_),output(output_),engine(engine_)
00047             {
00048                 output->open_file();
00049                 if(engine!=NULL)
00050                 {
00051                     engine->set_generator(gen_);
00052                     engine->add_branches(output);
00053                 }
00054                 output->branch(&(this->w),"weight");
00055                 output->branch(&(this->proc_id),"proc_id");
00056             }
00057 
00059 
00060             ~generator_interface()
00061             {
00062                 if(engine!=NULL)
00063                 {
00064                     delete engine;
00065                 }
00066                 delete output;
00067             }
00068 
00069             /* Public modifiers: */
00070             /*-------------------*/
00071 
00074 
00075             bool write()
00076             {
00077                 return output->close_file();
00078             }
00079 
00080             /* Public readout methods: */
00081             /*-------------------------*/
00082 
00084 
00085             size_type event_size() const
00086             {
00087                 if(engine!=NULL)
00088                 {
00089                     return (engine->event_size()+sizeof(value_type));
00090                 }
00091                 return 0;
00092             }
00093 
00095 
00096             bool write_statistics() const
00097             {
00098                 if(output==NULL)
00099                 {
00100                     return false;
00101                 }
00102                 std::ofstream ofs;
00103                 std::string fname(output->file_name+"_stats.dat");
00104                 ofs.open(fname.c_str());
00105                 if(ofs.is_open())
00106                 {
00107                     this->print_statistics(ofs);
00108                     ofs.close();
00109                     return true;
00110                 }
00111                 else
00112                 {
00113                     LOG(warning)<<"Failed to open file "<<fname<<"..."<<ENDLOG(warning);
00114                 }
00115                 return false;
00116             }
00117 
00118         protected:
00119 
00120 
00122 
00123             bool fill_event()
00124             {
00125                 if(engine!=NULL)
00126                 {
00127                     engine->fill();
00128                 }
00129                 return output->write_event(this->gen);
00130             }
00131 
00132         private:
00133 
00134             /* Generator instance: */
00135 
00136             generator_type* gen;
00137 
00138             /* Interface output instance: */
00139 
00140             interface_output<model_t>* output;
00141 
00142             /* Interface engine instance: */
00143 
00144             interface_engine<model_t>* engine;
00145     };
00146 }
00147 
00148 #endif /*GEN_IF_H_*/
